## Repositories

- [github.com/tbep-tech](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbep-tech.github.io): Github organization
    
    - [tbep-tech.github.io](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbep-tech.github.io): files for this Github website
    
    - [tbeptools](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbeptools) ([website](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbeptools/)): R library with utility functions for ingesting, modeling and visualizing TBEP data.  See the [vignette](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbeptools/articles/intro.html) for a detailed overview of the package. 

## Workshop surveys

- [Pre-workshop survey](https://forms.gle/B4W5BeSMNMdYrLkH9): Google forms pre-workhop survey to assess existing familiarity of open science principless and preliminary needs among stakeholders. 

- [Post-workshop survey](https://forms.gle/BbaXmmxiqywtU7oc7): Google forms post-workshop survey to assess overall experience from the workshop and level of understanding after the introduction to open science principles.

## Reporting

- **Rmarkdown** html: [Water Quality](https://tbep-tech.github.io/wq.html) (source: [wq.Rmd](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbep-tech.github.io/blob/master/wq.Rmd))

- **Shiny** app: [Water Quality Dashboard](https://shiny.tbeptech.org/tbeptools/inst/wq-dash/wq-dash.Rmd) (source: [wq-dash.Rmd](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbeptools/blob/master/inst/wq-dash/wq-dash.Rmd))

## Presentations

- [What is open science](http://tbep-tech.github.io/tbep-os-presentations/what_is_os.html): General overview of open science principles

- [SWMPrats open science example](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbep-os-presentations/SWMPrats_pres.html): Slide deck describing open science applications to the NERRS System Wide Monitoring Program

- [Evolution of the water quality reporting tool](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbep-os-presentations/evolution_reporting.html): Application of open science principles to the water quality reporting tool

- [Overcoming open science challenges](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbep-os-presentations/challenges_for_os.html): An overview of challenges to adopting open science and remedies for overcoming challenges
